step.Title: SoundcloudAPI
step.Notes: Utalizing the soundcloud API for use of pulling soundcloud music off of server per user

step.Title: GeoLocate to Store Locations
step.Notes: Using Google API to find nearest store with music avaliable

step.Title: LocalStorage + Online Store
step.Notes: Easy way to access/download and preview music using local storage for the purpose of keeping track of which samples they selected to access

step.Title: Rating System
step.Notes: Local storage and server storage of ratings per album in order to better showcase samples

step.Title: Alternative Themeing System with localstorage preferences
step.Notes: A or B theme for user preferences
